chapter.title: Snapshots
chapter.text:
We have received first couple of snapshots. They are quite interesting - just see for yourself:
FreeMiNT/N.AES desktop running Aniplayer (71kB)
Crystal Atari Browser (92kB)
Neon 1 (60kB) and 2 (59kB)
PmDoom and GEMDemo running in TrueColor (123kB)
ST-Guide and Blyp viewing The Atari Compendium HYPertext using 16bit fVDI driver (20kB)
